name: BeepBoop's Puzzle Adventure
description:
Guide the maintenance robot to fix and direct power to all of the lightbulbs in this electricity based puzzle game.

Move with arrow keys. Press enter while near broken lightbulbs to fix them. Press enter while on top of buttons to use them. Esc to pause.

Lead - Alexandra Ramirez

Producer - Katen Chin

Programmers - Scout Miller, Alexandra Ramirez, Megan Tsoi

Artists - Han Forbes, Leyna Ho, Danica Jew, Francesca Mancillas, Brian Khang Tran

Audio designer - Daniel Perez Pichardo
